bioconda.name: bioconductor-mirnameconverter
bioconda.summary: Convert miRNA Names to Different miRBase Versions

biotools.summary: Package containing an S4 class for translating mature miRNA names to different miRBase versions, sequence retrieval, checking names for validity and detecting miRBase version of a given set of names.

bioschemas.name: miRNAmeConverter
bioschemas.summary: Package containing an S4 class for translating mature miRNA names to different miRBase versions, sequence retrieval, checking names for validity and detecting miRBase version of a given set of names.
